snippet: A Texas abortion law passed last year that requires doctors to show sonograms to patients can be enforced while opponents challenge it in court, a federal appeals court said Tuesday.
abstract: Federal appeals court rules a Texas abortion law passed in 2011 that requires doctors to show sonograms to patients can be enforced while opponents challenge it in court.
lead_paragraph: A Texas abortion law passed last year that requires doctors to show sonograms to patients can be enforced while opponents challenge it in court, a federal appeals court said Tuesday.

headline.main: Texas: Court Allows Sonogram Law to Be Enforced
headline.print_headline: Texas: Court Allows Sonogram Law To Be Enforced
